name: Shell Template - Windows 7
description:
This is the continuation of @zeealeid's Shell Templates, but less popular and, probably worse to be honest, however, digging deeper into the rabbit hole, reaching out to Windows 7. Yeah, as old as dinosaurs, as fossils maybe! /j


Version 1.7 is out, including small fixes and revisions in the navigation and accurate navigation buttons. Check it out by duplicating! Leave comments on the toolkit if you run into any issues with specific parts.


Any problems or suggestions? Message me on Discord at dlphin#7965. My Twitter is there at @dlphesigns too. Happy designing! Don't forget to leave a heart if you've enjoyed this toolkit. Share your experiments with it and maybe some concepts by mentioning me on the Twitter handle mentioned before-hand.


Disclaimer: I am not affiliated with Microsoft, and all rights go to Microsoft Corporation and the designers who worked on the original interface. This UI is amazing, and I respect all of the designers. Hands-down my favourite Windows interface yet.
